hero.name: Muhammed Najeeb.
hero.description: I'm a Flutter developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences for mobile platforms.

paragraphsHtml: Hi, I'm Najeeb, a Flutter Developer and Mobile App Engineer passionate about crafting applications that are fast, scalable, and truly user-focused. With hands-on experience in production-grade apps, I bring together performance, clean architecture, and intuitive design to deliver seamless digital experiences.

My expertise includes state management, API-driven development, animations, and platform integrations. I care deeply about writing clean, maintainable code and building solutions that can grow and adapt with time. For me, great apps are not just functional, they're elegant and sustainable.

I thrive on continuous learning, constructive feedback, and staying ahead with modern Flutter/Dart practices. Known for being detail-oriented and pragmatic, I approach problem-solving with clarity while keeping long-term scalability in mind.

valuesGoals.valuesHtml: 🔹 Core Values: I believe in building with integrity, taking full ownership of my work, and staying committed to continuous learning. Every project I work on is driven by a pursuit of excellence in execution and a mindset of creating solutions that last.
valuesGoals.goalsHtml: 🔹 Goals: My vision is to grow into a senior engineering role where I can design scalable architectures, mentor developers, and help shape digital products that deliver meaningful impact to users and businesses alike.

experience.title: Flutter Developer
highlights: Built a full-featured ERP software for inventory, sales, purchase, and accounts management with real-time dashboards powered by WebSocket.
Developed a Learning Management System (LMS) with curriculum planning, examinations, and role-based dashboards — optimized for high concurrent usage.
Delivered an ERP for Event Management companies with booking, slot allocation, facility tracking, and automated financial reporting.
Applied Clean Architecture & Modular Development to ensure maintainability and scalability.
Used GetX & BLoC for efficient state management and GoRouter for navigation.
Integrated GraphQL APIs for optimized data querying and reduced backend overhead.
Enhanced app performance by profiling API calls and optimizing response time.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Git and GitHub for version control.

experience.title: Flutter Developer Intern
highlights: Developed DIGIBANK (Banking App Clone) with account overview, balance details, and transaction history using Provider state management and Clean Architecture.
Created YUMMLY (Recipe Recommendation App) featuring personalized recommendations, recipe uploads, bookmarking, and smooth API integrations for dynamic data.
Implemented Custom Clean Architecture to ensure code modularity, scalability, and maintainability.
Integrated REST APIs and Firebase for real-time communication and backend synchronization.
Optimized application performance and ensured intuitive, user-friendly interfaces.
Collaborated with team members using Git and GitHub for effective version control and code management.

projects.title: Device Info
projects.description: A premium Flutter-based device information dashboard delivering real-time hardware insights through custom-rendered visualizations. Built with BLoC and Clean Architecture, it combines native-level accuracy with high-performance animations and a futuristic glassmorphic UI.
features: Real-time battery, CPU, RAM, storage, sensors, network, and location monitoring
CustomPaint-driven visualizations (radar sweep, liquid battery, signal waves)
Native Android & iOS data access via Method and Event Channels
Advanced animation orchestration with performance-aware throttling
Accessibility-aware rendering with reduced-motion and battery-saver modes

projects.title: Task Matrix
projects.description: A scalable task management platform built with Flutter and Supabase — designed for teams operating across multiple organizations. It balances real-time collaboration, gamified productivity, and clean architecture principles to ensure maintainability and performance.
features: Implements modular architecture using feature-specific BLoCs
Secure authentication, role management, and real-time updates via Supabase
Task points, leaderboards, and progress tracking for team motivation

projects.title: Responsive Text Plus
projects.description: A Flutter package that dynamically scales text size based on screen or container dimensions, ensuring perfect readability and design consistency across devices.
features: Auto-adjusts font size within defined min/max limits
Supports rich text and multi-line scaling
Optimized for performance on mobile, web, and desktop
Provides fluid typography and overflow handling options

projects.title: Flutter Portfolio
projects.description: A professionally architected Flutter Web application showcasing clean architecture, smooth animations, and automated CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions deployment.
features: Clean Architecture with domain-driven design and repository pattern
BLoC-based theme management with light/dark mode inversion
Automated testing and deployment pipeline via GitHub Actions
60fps performance with optimized rendering and motion background

projects.title: ERP Software
projects.description: Enterprise-grade ERP covering inventory control, sales workflows, purchase cycles, and financial accounting — designed for high reliability and smooth multi-department operations.
features: Live dashboards with WebSocket for real-time stock & financial data
Inventory, sales, purchase, and accounts tracking
Role-based access for different user levels

projects.title: Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description: School-focused LMS featuring role-based dashboards for admins, teachers, complete with attendance tracking, assignments, grading, and exam management.
features: Exam management with high concurrent usage support
Role-based dashboards for teachers, students, and admins

projects.title: Event ERP
projects.description: Custom ERP tailored for event management companies, enabling streamlined client handling, vendor coordination, budgeting, and real-time event workflow tracking.
features: Enhanced UI workflows for faster staff productivity

projects.title: DIGIBANK
projects.description: Banking Application Clone with seamless financial services.
features: Account overview with balance and transaction details

projects.title: YUMMLY
projects.description: Recipe Recommendation App with personalized suggestions.

projects.title: Placement Assistance App
projects.description: Platform connecting companies, students, and administrators.

projects.title: Quiz App
features: Dynamic quiz content fetched from API
